bug.author: maobaolong
bug.summary: Upgrade XStream version to 1.4.14 to fix Secure issue
bug.description:
Alluxio Version: Alluxio 2.4.0, Alluxio master branch Describe the bug <denchmark-link:http://x-stream.github.io/CVE-2020-26217.html>http://x-stream.github.io/CVE-2020-26217.html</denchmark-link>
Urgency We need to upgrade the XStream version to fix the secure issue.
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/x-stream/xstream/releases>https://github.com/x-stream/xstream/releases</denchmark-link>
